author: Simon's Cat
description:
Are you brave enough to take on this spooky movie marathon? 
Check out our limited edition halloween mug - https://simonscatmerch.com/products/halloween-mug-limited-edition

Grab your treats, snuggle up with your cat, and load YouTube onto your TV, because it's movie night! Lift your spirits with every Simon's Cat Halloween special back-to-back 🎃

title: The Spookiest Simon's Cat Halloween Marathon Ever! - Movie Night
